REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0770 reute d f BC-BECHTEL,-CONTROL-RESO 10-19 0043

TEXT.TITLE: BECHTEL, CONTROL RESOURCE <CRIX.O> IN VENTURE
TEXT.BODY: <Bechtel Corp> said it has formed a joint venture with Control Resource Industries Inc called Bechtel-Control Asbestos Management Inc to perform large-scale asbestos abatement projects. Reuter
